textTranslated.en:
CHOLERA RESURFACES IN DOUALA

The report revolved around the demise of a patient within the community, an
event that triggered concern among the residents. The neighbors urged the
wife to consider relocating, fearing that her presence might pose a risk of
contagion to the entire locality, which raises concerns of stigmatization and
show information gaps about how cholera spreads
